title: Minimal Dependence on UN CERF Funds
description: In 2021, Fiji received only $500,000 in net official flows from UN agencies, CERF, indicating a minimal reliance on these emergency funds compared to other nations.

title: Low Number of Children Living with HIV
description: As of 2022, only 100 children aged 0-14 were living with HIV in Fiji, showcasing one of the lowest prevalence rates globally.
